title: Transferring from Pixel 2 to Pixel 3. I want to copy all apps, apps data, settings and accounts.
content:
I cannot transfer all data to my new Pixel 3. I need to go through all apps and start again:
• setup banking account apps
• login to each app like Spotify, Blinkist etc. Any app that has an account is reset
• email app requires reset of all accounts

Can I just copy everything and use my phone like the old one without doing ANY other action?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
